p: We found that this virus tended to infect younger individuals and caused more severe symptoms, including death, in very young patients. EV71 infection, which was the most frequently detected strain during the study period, is associated with neurological complications and, since 2009, has been responsible for most cases of EV infection. Notably, EV71 was not detected at all between 2001 and 2005, after 12 cases were reported in 2000 [ 19].
